english.segment1: I know He rescued my soul. His blood covered my sin. I believe, I believe
english.segment2: My shame He's taken away. My pain is healed in His name. I believe, I believe
english.segment3: i'll reise a banner. 'Cause my Lord has conquered the grave. My Redeemer live, my Redeemer lives. My Redeemer live, my Redeemer lives
english.segment4: You lift my burden and I rise with You. I'm dancing on this mountain top. To see Your Kingdom come
